title: JSON schema for SurveyMan output
description: This is the schema to be passed between a library or runtime system to the survey host. The JSON object will be interpreteed by the SurveyMan JS library

filename.description: The source file used to generate this survey. This string is a convenience for retreiving and parsing survey data.

breakoff.description: Indicates whether breakoff is permitted in this survey at any point. This will trigger a notice about allowing breakoff.

survey.description: The survey content. This essentially an array of blocks
